comment.author: 76016463@N00
comment._content: Princess Evelyn Pardridge Engalitcheff (LOC note misspelling), a department store heiress from Chicago, married from 1898 to 1916 to a Russian nobleman. She was involved in a bitter high profile divorce from Prince Nicholas Engalitcheff in New York in December, 1915. Lurid details at: select.nytimes.com/gst/abstract.html?res=F70917FA355C1373... See also

comment.author: 34904489@N07
comment._content: artolog: Thanks for the comments. We will note that the original caption has a misspelling and offer the correct one, and add the more complete name as well.
